message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll love it, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $1100000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.

I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I think your initial offer is a bit too high. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you think $900000 is a fair price, Bob, but I have to consider my own interests as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My next offer is $950000. This is a generous offer, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further and make a counteroffer of $920000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $920000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. My next offer is $980000. This is as low as I can go, and I hope you'll find it reasonable.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $950000. I think this is the highest price I'm willing to pay, considering the product's value to me.
